actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide that the Chief of the Army Nurse Corps be appointed in the regular grade of brigadier general.

summary.text: Amends the provisions concerning the organization of the Department of the Army to require that the Chief of the Army Nurse Corps be appointed in the regular grade of brigadier general.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide that the Chief of the Army Nurse Corps be appointed in the regular grade of brigadier general.
